__inputs.name: InfluxDB_Performance
__inputs.label: vm_pgsql_box_a
__inputs.description: Datasource com métricas gerais do Host. (CPU, Memória, Disco, Uptime, SWAP e etc...)

description:
Dashboard que coleta as seguintes informações:
OS: Linux 
Métrics: CPU, Memória, Disco, Swap, Processos, Load Averages, PostgreSQL, Postgres Replication

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_idle") AS "mean_usage_idle" FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") AS "mean_usage_iowait" FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "mean_usage_user" FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") AS "mean_usage_system" FROM "cpu" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s) FILL(null)
select "blocked","running","sleeping","total","total_threads","zombies" from "processes" where $timeFilter

panels.description: Cada métrica significa o tempo, 1, 5, 15 minutos respectivamente. Esses são os valores médios dos processos esperando execução.

targets.query: SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

panels.title: Load Averages

targets.query: SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'postgres01') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") AS "total", mean("used") AS "used", mean("free") AS "free" FROM "swap" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT mean("in") AS "in", mean("out") AS "out" FROM "swap" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s)

alert.message: Há pouco espaço livre em armazenamento
alert.name: Disk Usage alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("total") AS "total" FROM "disk" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND "path"='/' GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT mean("free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND "path"='/' GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT mean("used") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND "path"='/' GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 30s) AS "read_bytes", non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 30s) AS "write_bytes" FROM "diskio" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s)

alert.message: O número de conexões no postgres está alto.
alert.name: Connection Status alert

targets.query: SELECT sum("amount") AS "total connections" FROM "pg_connections" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("amount") AS "mean_amount" FROM "pg_connections" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s), "state" FILL(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_fetched"),30s) AS "fetched", non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_returned"),30s) AS "returned" FROM "postgresql" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND "db"='postgres' GROUP BY time(30s)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_inserted"),30s) AS "inserts", non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_updated"),30s) AS "updates", non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_deleted"),10s) AS "deletes" FROM "postgresql" WHERE time > now() - 30m AND "db"='postgres' GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT last("size_mb") AS "mean_size_mb" FROM "pg_schemas_size" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(30s), "schema_name" FILL(null)

title: Monitoring PostgreSQL Server, Postgres replication
